sentences.en: A flurry of wind upset the small boat.
A flurry of wind upset the small sailboat.
Chueh - hui felt a brief flurry of panic, but he suppressed it immediately.
sentences.cn: 觉慧稍微现出吃惊的样子, 但是马上又安静了.

sentences.en: I'm always in a flurry ( ie confused and disorganized ) as deadlines get nearer.
sentences.cn: 一接近最后期限我就忙乱不堪.

sentences.en: It was a regular flurry of large, soft, white flakes.
sentences.cn: 雪不停地下着,雪片又大又软又白.

sentences.en: It'stretched away on either side with nothing to be seen but a flurry of snowflakes.
sentences.cn: 到桥上,左右空旷,一眼望去,全是雪花.

sentences.en: Lengths of white veiling, like a snow - flurry, buried the little work - table.
sentences.cn: 老长一块儿白纱, 像雪幔似的遮住了那张小裁缝台.

sentences.en: Oh , nothing to flurry you so, Mary.
sentences.cn: 啊! 你不用慌张, 玛丽.

sentences.en: She got carried away in a flurry of excitement, but we brought her down to earth by reminding her of the tasks waiting to be down.
sentences.cn: 她在一阵兴奋之中有些想入非非, 但是我们提醒她还有许多事情要做,才使她从幻想回到现实中来.

sentences.en: The conviction came as a shock, and she stood still in a flurry of thought.
sentences.cn: 这一肯定之后,她就象触电一样, 站在那里不动,思绪纷集.

sentences.en: There is always a certain flurry in a country - house on Sunday morning.
sentences.cn: 在乡村居室里,星期天上午照例有一翻忙乱.

sentences.en: There was a flurry of activity as the film star appeared on the balcony.
sentences.cn: 那名影星在阳台上一露面就引发了一阵骚动.

sentences.en: There was a flurry of excitement in the vestibule.
sentences.cn: 过道里传来一阵匆忙的脚步声.

sentences.en: There was a gasp and a flurry at Winston's side.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿身旁有人倒吸一口气.

sentences.en: These young fellows are all in a flurry.
sentences.cn: 他们全都是一些毛毛楞楞的小伙子.

trans.tran_cn: 一阵风、雨或雪，爆发，骚动
